WHERE USER_NAME LIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '') || '%'
WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '') || '%'
WHERE DONATEWRITE_TITLE LIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '') || '%'

SELECT D.DONATE_NUMBER, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, D.DONATE_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(D.DONATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DONATE_DATE FROM TBL_DONATE D JOIN TBL_USERS U ON D.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER WHERE D.DONATEWRITE_NUMBER = ${donateWriteNumber}
